name.vi: Bộ chuyển đổi tập tin - Bằng Online-Convert.com

short.ar: حوّل ملفاتك من أي صيغة إلى صيغة أخرى والعكس. التطبيق الرسمي من online-convert.com
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Convert your files from one format to another. The official app from online-convert.com
short.de: Wandle deine Dateien von einem Format in ein anderes um. Die offizielle App von Online-Convert.com
short.es: Convierte tus archivos de un formato a otro. Aplicación oficial de online-convert.com
short.fr: Convertissez vos fichiers d'un format à un autre. L'application officielle d'online-convert.com
short.hi: अपनी फाइलों को एक फॉर्मेट से दूसरे फॉर्मेट में बदलें। online-convert.com का आधिकारिक ऐप
short.id: Konversi file Anda dari satu format ke format lain. Aplikasi resmi dari online-convert.com
short.it: Converti i tuoi file da un formato all'altro. L'app ufficiale di online-convert.com
short.pt_PT: Converta seus arquivos de um formato para outro. O app oficial do online-convert.com
short.ru: Преобразуйте файлы из одного формата в другой. Официальное приложение online-convert.com
short.vi: Chuyển đổi tập tin từ định dạng này sang định dạng khác. Ứng dung chính thức từ online-convert.com
short.zh_CN: 将文件从一种格式转换为另一种格式。 来自online-convert.com的官方应用程序

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
High quality file converter to convert files from one format to another. Integrated with Gmail. Speed up your productivity by adding online-convert.com to Chrome!

★ The tool adds an icon in your extension toolbar and lets you convert files there without the need to visit our webpage.

★ The file converter contains the following conversion tools:
- An image converter for raster & vector images
- A document converter
- A video converter
- An audio converter for music
- A compression tool to minimize files (e.g. before sending them via email)

★ The integration with Gmail is called when you compose a message and click on the small icon within the compose window.

★ The best about Online-Convert.com is that you can convert across file categories. That way you can convert an image containing text using OCR to a fully editable Word document.

If you have any questions, requests or need to get in touch with us, send us an e-mail to time2help@online-convert.com

By installing the extension, you agree to our terms at https://www.online-convert.com/terms
